ISSUE.TITLE: Add more searchable media types in Elasticsearch/Lucene
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe. Currently we only support searching in PDF files in Elasticsearch. ### Describe the solution you'd like We should be able to search .doc, .docx, .txt, .rtf, .ppt, .pptx. We can easily use Spire.Doc to add this suppor ### Describe alternatives you've considered I added support to all these in my own project

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Allow more file types to be indexable.
